sentences.sentence: Objective to sum up our experience of carotid endarterectomy (CEA).
sentences.translation: 目的总结我们行颈动脉内膜剥脱术的经验。

sentences.sentence: Endarterectomy removes fatty plaque through an incision in the neck.
sentences.translation: 通过在颈部切口去除内膜上的脂肪斑块。

sentences.sentence: Objective to evaluate the beneficial effects of microsurgical carotid endarterectomy.
sentences.translation: 目的评估显微颈动脉内膜切除的效果。
